name: Arson and Plunder: Unleashed
description: Arson & Plunder is a 2D arcade/beat'em up adventure based on the genre classics of the 90's. The classic gameplay has been brought up to speed with the latest developments and trends! In typical beat'em up style, playing an orc or elf you wade through hordes of enemies out to kill you.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP SP2, Vista, 7, 8 处理器: Dual-core 2.0 GHz or equivalent 内存: 3 GB RAM 图形: 512Mb DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间 声卡: Any Windows compatible sound card 附注事项: Controllers supported: Microsoft Xbox 360, Microsoft Xbox One, Sony PlayStation 4

reviews.review_text: Not terrible. Not worth $7, maybe $1 TBH Thought it looked like castle crashers, was kind of let down. It kind of looked like it was slapped together in a couple hours. Cute kids game, but for season veterns you might want to steer clear.
THe game does have it's flaws, but I think the negative reviews does it injustice. The game was pretty fun to play and I enjoyed playing it with my friend locally. :)

+ Such a cute game! + I'm in love with the soundtracks! + Nice arcade graphics! + 3 Special Skills for orc and elf + Excellent Lore, loved it so far  - No leveling - No talents or skills or points - No upgrade system - No point in playing more than once  Verdict: 5.5/10 -> Would buy if developers upgrade the game and add an upgrade system that can actually keep the player interested. However, nice and simple story.
Controls (movement, attacks, everything) are so bad that it's frustrating, unplayable. You have been warned.
